Title: Sloppity Bilepiper, Herald of Nurgle
Legend: Sloppity Bilepipers caper through the ranks of Nurgle’s legions as they advance. Infected with a plague of mirth, they prance and quip, entertaining their fellow daemons even as they cause the enemy to literally die laughing.
Intro: A Sloppity Bilepiper, Herald of Nurgle, is armed with a Marotter.

Rules.Name: Battalions
Rules.Rule: BATTALIONS: This warscroll can be used in the following warscroll battalions: • Rancid Retinue • Invidian Plaguehost
A Stabbing We Will Go! Add 1 to wound rolls for attacks made by friendly NURGLE DAEMON units wholly within 14" of any friendly SLOPPITY BILEPIPERS playing this tune.
